name: Cyborg's Revenge
description: This is my first video game. It is very basic and made in Construct 3. It has 3 levels. First get your score to 5000 by killing enemies, then kill the boss with 300 health. Finally there is a third level with the final boss. He has 5000 health. You start out with 50 health and can pick up bandages to gain more health. You have unlimited ammo. Right-Click and Left-Click are your two weapons you can shoot. I hope to make many more. Thanks for playing.
